summary: The diff implements all five requirements. REQ-57 (Login screen with phone OTP flow) is restored in Login.tsx with country code selector defaulting to +91, Send OTP button, terms & conditions checkbox, and no II-related UI. REQ-58 (OTP Verification page) is restored in OtpVerification.tsx with 6 digit inputs, 60-second timer, Resend OTP button, Verify button, localStorage session storage, and navigation logic. REQ-59 (Profile Setup) reads phone from localStorage auth_session and requires the phone field. REQ-60 (Splash) uses localStorage session detection. REQ-61 (Profile logout) clears localStorage without II logout. However, the helper hint text in OtpVerification.tsx does not exactly match the required text, and phone is stored in sessionStorage rather than component state in Login.tsx.

missing_requirements.requirement: Store the phone number in component state on submission
missing_requirements.reason: Login.tsx stores the phone in sessionStorage.setItem('otp_phone', fullPhone) rather than component state as specified by the requirement. The state variable phoneNumber holds the input but the requirement says to store the phone number in component state after submission for use by the OTP page.

missing_requirements.requirement: The helper hint 'Enter any 6-digit code to verify' is visible below the input boxes
missing_requirements.reason: OtpVerification.tsx shows 'Enter the 6-digit code sent to your phone number' rather than the exact required hint text 'Enter any 6-digit code to verify' which is specified in both the requirement and the acceptance criteria.

hallucinated_features.description: sessionStorage is also cleared on logout via sessionStorage.removeItem('otp_phone') in the Profile page logout handler
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-61 only specifies clearing the localStorage auth session and redirecting to /login. Clearing sessionStorage was not part of the requested logout behavior.
